title: Ranked Season Rewards
body: Am i able to get my gold border etc even though i'm chat restricted?

replies.body:
> Players with bans or chat restrictions active when the season ends are ineligible for this yearâ€™s rewards.

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2016-ranked-season-ends-soon

can i plz have my silver border it was one day off. and i feel as if there should be some sort of reward for better behaviour
 please justify that.

Short answer, no.

Long answer, you can submit a ticket to player support and ask if you really want, but in the end, you got punished for a reason, and if you've been working it off then that's great, but you still have to face the consequences of your past actions. This restriction is nothing new, and in fact in the past couple years has been less harsh that it was. To the best of my knowledge it used to be if you'd had a ban at any point during the season you would be ineligible.

Good luck to you for next season.
